testcase.name: TC01_User should see login Form if not authenticated
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed Then user assert that Login Form contains username, password and login button.passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed

testcase.name: TC02_User should see validation errors if click the login button without fill the login form
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed Then user assert that validation errors.....................................passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed

testcase.name: TC03_User should navigate to the dashboard and see welcome message if authenticate successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user enters valid username and password.................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed Then user verifies welcome message..........................................passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed
